channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) – October 2024】Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) – 2024 年 10 月
item.description: 【This post announces the October release of the Azure Developer CLI (`azd`), including configurable api-version for ACA.】这篇文章宣布了 10 月份发布的 Azure 开发人员 CLI (`azd`)，包括 ACA 的可配置 api 版本。

item.title: 【Catch the highlights from Azure Developers – .NET Aspire Day 2024!】了解 Azure 开发人员的亮点 - 2024 年 .NET Aspire Day！
item.description: 【Watch the top sessions on demand for insights and practical guidance on building distributed applications with .NET Aspire!】按需观看顶级会议，了解有关使用 .NET Aspire 构建分布式应用程序的见解和实用指导！

item.title: 【A quick introduction to return address protection technologies】返回地址保护技术快速介绍
item.description: 【Detecting attempts to manipulate the return address.】检测操纵返回地址的尝试。

item.title: 【The ultimate chatbot?】终极聊天机器人？
item.description: 【RAG – Retrieval Augmented Generation – is by far one of the most common patterns today as it enables the creation of chatbots that can chat on your own data, as I described in my previous “Retrieval Augmented Generation with Azure SQL” blog post. As soon as you start to use it excitement grows, as […]】RAG（检索增强生成）是迄今为止最常见的模式之一，因为它可以创建可以在您自己的数据上聊天的聊天机器人，正如我在之前的“使用 Azure SQL 进行检索增强生成”博客文章中所述。一旦您开始使用它，兴奋就会增加，因为 [...]

item.title: 【What’s new in System.Text.Json in .NET 9】.NET 9 中 System.Text.Json 的新增功能
item.description: 【An overview of all new .NET 9 features in System.Text.Json for developers.】为开发人员概述了 System.Text.Json 中的所有新 .NET 9 功能。

item.title: 【Effects of classic return address tricks on hardware-assisted return address protection】经典返回地址技巧对硬件辅助返回地址保护的影响
item.description: 【Return address manipulations that are possibly even more impermissible than they already were.】返回地址操纵可能比以前更加不允许。

item.title: 【How we build GitHub Copilot into Visual Studio】我们如何将 GitHub Copilot 构建到 Visual Studio 中
item.description: 【Find out how Visual Studio integrates GitHub Copilot, architectural detail, .NET implementation, and the importance of the indexing service for providing context-aware AI code suggestions.】了解 Visual Studio 如何集成 GitHub Copilot、架构细节、.NET 实现，以及索引服务对于提供上下文感知 AI 代码建议的重要性。

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 control spotlight: Information security risk management】Microsoft 365 控制焦点：信息安全风险管理
item.description: 【Read how Microsoft 365 Certification verifies information security risk management.】了解 Microsoft 365 认证如何验证信息安全风险管理。

item.title: 【Improve your debugger game with editable expressions】使用可编辑表达式改进您的调试器游戏
item.description: 【Do you ever wish you could quickly test different queries on your collections or datasets while debugging? Do you want to save time and avoid writing code just to inspect your data? If you answered yes, then you will love the new editable expression feature in the Visual Studio debugger. This feature allows you to […]】您是否希望在调试时可以快速测试集合或数据集上的不同查询？您想节省时间并避免仅为检查数据而编写代码吗？如果您的回答是“是”，那么您一定会喜欢 Visual Studio 调试器中新的可编辑表达式功能。此功能允许您[...]

item.title: 【Introducing Pull Request Annotation for CodeQL and Dependency Scanning in GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps】在 GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps 中引入 CodeQL 的拉取请求注释和依赖项扫描
item.description: 【In the world of software development, security is paramount. As developers, we strive to write clean, efficient, and most importantly, secure code. GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps has always been at the forefront of providing tools that make it easier to build and release high-quality software. Today, we’re excited to announce a new feature […]】在软件开发领域，安全性至关重要。作为开发人员，我们努力编写干净、高效、最重要的是安全的代码。 GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps 始终走在提供工具的前沿，让您可以更轻松地构建和发布高质量软件。今天，我们很高兴宣布一项新功能 [...]
